snippet.title: Atelier Marie Remake: The Alchemist of Salburg - Announcement Trailer (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
Introducing Atelier Marie Remake: The Alchemist of Salburg! Explore a re-imagined take on the classic RPG title, celebrating the 25th anniversary of the Atelier series and coming to the west for the very first time.

Atelier Marie Remake: The Alchemist of Salburg releases for Nintendo Switch on July 13th 2023 on Nintendo eShop.

Facebook Nintendo Switch: https://facebook.com/NintendoSwitchUK
Twitter Nintendo UK: https://twitter.com/NintendoUK
Instagram Nintendo UK: https://www.instagram.com/nintendouk/
YouTube Nintendo UK: https://bit.ly/2cREWfu
Twitch Nintendo UK: https://twitch.tv/NintendoUK
